name: PHP Encryption
tagline: A simple PHP API to encrypt and decrypt a string on any web app.
body:
### PHP Encryption. PHP's mcrypt functions can be used to encrypt data, but it's not easy to use them correctly. So Here is a simple PHP API which makes this process more easier than ever. On passing a string to the function crypt() the string can be encrypted and similarly decrypt() is used to decrypt the encrypted string easily. 
require_once('encryption.php');

$encrypted_string = encrypt('Hello World!');

$decrypted_string = decrypt($encrypted_string);
### How to use PHP Encryption 1.Include API (download from github) 
include('encryption.php');
2.Pass the value to php from html form or directly pass the value to the function 
input type="text" name="string"
$encrypted_string = encrypt($_POST['string']); 
$encrypted_string = encrypt('Hello World!');
3.To display Encrypted String 
echo $encrypted_string;
4.To decrypt a string 
$decrypted_string = decrypt($encrypted_string);

echo $decrypted_string;
